passes.description: Ensures aria-hidden='true' is not present on the document body.
passes.help: aria-hidden='true' must not be present on the document body

any.message: No aria-hidden attribute is present on document body

passes.description: Ensures each page has at least one mechanism for a user to bypass navigation and jump straight to the content
passes.help: Page must have means to bypass repeated blocks

any.message: Page has a heading

passes.description: Ensures the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA contrast ratio thresholds
passes.help: Elements must have sufficient color contrast

any.message: Element has sufficient color contrast of 12.63

passes.description: Ensures each HTML document contains a non-empty <title> element
passes.help: Documents must have <title> element to aid in navigation

any.message: Document has a non-empty <title> element

passes.description: Ensures every id attribute value is unique
passes.help: id attribute value must be unique

any.message: Document has no static elements that share the same id attribute

passes.description: Ensures headings have discernible text
passes.help: Headings should not be empty

any.message: Element has text that is visible to screen readers

passes.description: Ensures form field does not have multiple label elements
passes.help: Form field must not have multiple label elements

none.message: Form field does not have multiple label elements

passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(5) > form:nth-child(4) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(5) > form:nth-child(4) > h2:nth-child(3)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(5) > form:nth-child(4) > h2:nth-child(5)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(5) > form:nth-child(4) > h2:nth-child(7)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(1) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(2) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(3) > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(4) > h3:nth-child(1)

any.message: Heading order valid

passes.description: Ensures every HTML document has a lang attribute
passes.help: <html> element must have a lang attribute

any.message: The <html> element has a lang attribute

passes.description: Ensures the lang attribute of the <html> element has a valid value
passes.help: <html> element must have a valid value for the lang attribute

none.message: Value of lang attribute is included in the list of valid languages

passes.description: Ensure that HTML elements with both valid lang and xml:lang attributes agree on the base language of the page
passes.help: HTML elements with lang and xml:lang must have the same base language

all.message: Lang and xml:lang attributes have the same base language

passes.description: Ensure that links with the same accessible name serve a similar purpose
passes.help: Links with the same name must have a similar purpose

all.message: There are no other links with the same name, that go to a different URL

passes.description: Ensures elements have alternate text or a role of none or presentation
passes.help: Images must have alternate text

any.message: Element has an alt attribute
Element has a title attribute

none.message: Element has a valid alt attribute value

passes.description: Ensure image alternative is not repeated as text
passes.help: Alternative text of images should not be repeated as text

none.message: Element does not duplicate existing text in alt text

passes.description: Ensures input buttons have discernible text
passes.help: Input buttons must have discernible text

any.message: Element has a non-empty value attribute

passes.description: Ensures that every form element has a visible label and is not solely labeled using hidden labels, or the title or aria-describedby attributes
passes.help: Form elements should have a visible label

none.message: Form element does not solely use title attribute for its label

passes.description: Ensures links have discernible text
passes.help: Links must have discernible text

any.message: Element has text that is visible to screen readers

none.message: Element is not in tab order or has accessible text

passes.description: Ensures that lists are structured correctly
passes.help: <ul> and <ol> must only directly contain <li>, <script> or <template> elements

none.message: List element only has direct children that are allowed inside <li> elements

passes.description: Ensures <li> elements are used semantically
passes.help: <li> elements must be contained in a <ul> or <ol>

any.message: List item has a <ul>, <ol> or role="list" parent element

passes.description: Ensures interactive controls are not nested as they are not always announced by screen readers or can cause focus problems for assistive technologies
passes.help: Interactive controls must not be nested

any.message: Element does not have focusable descendants

passes.description: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading
passes.help: Page should contain a level-one heading

all.message: Page has at least one level-one heading

passes.description: Ensures all page content is contained by landmarks
passes.help: All page content should be contained by landmarks

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks

passes.description: Ensure the <caption> element does not contain the same text as the summary attribute
passes.help: tables should not have the same summary and caption

none.message: Content of summary attribute and <caption> are not duplicated

passes.description: Ensure that each cell in a table that uses the headers attribute refers only to other cells in that table
passes.help: Table cells that use the headers attribute must only refer to cells in the same table

all.message: The headers attribute is exclusively used to refer to other cells in the table

passes.description: Ensure that <th> elements and elements with role=columnheader/rowheader have data cells they describe
passes.help: Table headers in a data table must refer to data cells

all.message: All table header cells refer to data cells
